半.definition: half; semi-; incomplete; (after a number) and a half

半信半疑.definition: (idiom) half believing, half doubting; not quite convinced; skeptical

半分兒.definition: erhua variant of 半分[ban4 fen1]

半勞動力.definition: one able to do light manual labor only; semi-able-bodied or part time (farm) worker

半吊子.definition: dabbler; smatterer; tactless and impulsive person

半坡.definition: Banpo neolithic Yangshao culture archaeological site east of Xi'an 西安

半坡遺址.definition: Banpo neolithic Yangshao culture archaeological site east of Xi'an 西安

半場.definition: half of a game or contest; half-court

半壁江山.definition: half of the country (esp. when half the country has fallen into enemy hands); vast swathe of territory

半壁河山.definition: see 半壁江山[ban4 bi4 jiang1 shan1]

半夜.definition: midnight; in the middle of the night

半天.definition: half of the day; a long time; quite a while; midair; CL:個|个[ge4]

半封建半殖民地.pinyin: bàn fēng jiàn bàn zhí mín dì
半封建半殖民地.definition: semifeudal and semicolonial (the official Marxist description of China in the late Qing and under the Guomindang)

半導體探測器.pinyin: bàn dǎo tǐ tàn cè qì

半履帶車.definition: half-track (vehicle with wheels at the front and continuous tracks in the rear)

半島國際學校.pinyin: bàn dǎo guó jì xué xiào

半工半讀.definition: part work, part study; work-study program

半懂不懂.definition: to not fully understand; to only partly understand

半成品.definition: semi-manufactured goods; semifinished articles; semifinished products

半推半就.definition: half willing and half unwilling (idiom); to yield after making a show of resistance

半斤八兩.definition: not much to choose between the two; tweedledum and tweedledee

半日工作.definition: part-time work in which one works each day for a half-day, typically a morning or an afternoon

半晌.definition: half of the day; a long time; quite a while

半桶水.definition: (coll.) (of one's skills, knowledge etc) limited; superficial; half-baked; sb with a smattering of knowledge (of sth); dabbler

半條命.definition: half a life; only half alive; barely alive; (scared, beaten etc) half to death

半死.definition: half dead (of torment, hunger, tiredness etc); (tired) to death; (terrified) out of one's wits; (beaten) to within an inch of one's life; (knock) the daylights out of sb

半熟.definition: half-cooked; (of vegetables) parboiled; (of steak) medium; (of eggs) soft-boiled

半瓶水響叮噹.pinyin: bàn píng shuǐ xiǎng dīng dāng
半瓶水響叮噹.definition: lit. if you tap a half-empty bottle it makes a sound (idiom); fig. empty vessels make the most noise; one who has a little knowledge likes to show off, but one who is truly knowledgeable is modest

半瓶醋.definition: dabbler; dilettante who speaks as though he were an expert

半生不熟.definition: underripe; half-cooked; (fig.) not mastered (of a technique); clumsy; halting

半糖夫妻.definition: weekend spouse; relationship involving a sugar-daddy

半翅目.definition: Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)

半老徐娘.definition: middle-aged but still attractive woman; lady of a certain age

半胱氨酸.definition: cysteine (Cys), an amino acid; mercaptoethyl amine

半脫產.definition: partly released from productive labor; partly released from one's regular work

半腱肌.definition: semitendinosus, one of the hamstring muscles in the thigh

半表半裡.definition: half outside, half inside; half interior, half exterior

半跏坐.definition: sitting with one leg crossed (usu. of Bodhisattva)

半路出家.definition: lit. to enter monastic life at a mature age (idiom); fig. to change one's career; to take up a new line of work or specialization; to enter a profession from a different background

半路殺出個程咬金.pinyin: bàn lù shā chū gè chéng yǎo jīn
半路殺出個程咬金.definition: lit. Cheng Yaojin ambushes the enemy (saying); fig. sb shows up unexpectedly and disrupts the plan; sb whose presence is regarded as irksome

半路殺出的程咬金.pinyin: bàn lù shā chū de chéng yǎo jīn
半路殺出的程咬金.definition: see 半路殺出個程咬金|半路杀出个程咬金[ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1]

半蹼鷸.definition: (bird species of China) Asian dowitcher (Limnodromus semipalmatus)

半身不遂.definition: paralysis of one side of the body; hemiplegia

半途而廢.definition: to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished

半邊.definition: half of sth; one side of sth

半邊天.definition: half the sky; women of the new society; womenfolk

半開門兒.definition: erhua variant of 半開門|半开门[ban4 kai1 men2]

半響.definition: half the day; a long time; quite a while

半馬.definition: half-marathon (abbr. for 半程馬拉松|半程马拉松[ban4cheng2 ma3la1song1])

半麻醉.definition: local anesthetic; anesthesia to half the body (as for a C-section birth)
